title:
Why is there no sidewalk being built along Independence Blvd adjacent to The Point at Barclay, when the developers have repeatedly stated how pedestrian/bike friendly it will be?



The only bike/pedestrian-friendly access is currently George Anderson where the shoulder is fenced off due to apartment construction.  Why is no safe pedestrian crossing being put at Museum Drive...especially since the same developers (Cameron) built The Forks?
